name: box_convert
description: Converts boxes from given in_fmt to out_fmt.

inputs.name: in_fmt
inputs.description: Input format of given boxes. Supported formats are [‘xyxy’, ‘xywh’, ‘cxcywh’].

inputs.name: out_fmt
inputs.description: Output format of given boxes. Supported formats are [‘xyxy’, ‘xywh’, ‘cxcywh’].
